product.name: Fearless Eyeliner
product.description: Make eyes pop with this velvety smooth eyeliner that glides on effortlessly and precisely. Make your eyes pop with this sleek, easy-to-use eyeliner. Formulated with both jojoba seed oil and shea butter, its velvety smooth formula glides on effortlessly and precisely. To sharpen, place inside sharpener and turn the pencil gently to create a working tip.
